Additional Text: A comment open sequence (/*) appears within a comment.  This usually means an earlier comment was not closed.
An rvalue is used that may not be initialized to a value on some execution path.

Warning Text: Path with no return in function declared to return int
Additional Text: There is a path through a function declared to return a value on which there is no return statement. This means the execution may fall through without returning a meaningful result to the caller.
